metadata.name: Courtside
metadata.description:
This artwork is part of Hoop Heaven collection, a collaboration between architect and digital artist Sattom Alasad known for her otherworldly digital-scapes, and artist Victor Solomon known as the go-to artist for NBA stars for his opulent explorations of the icons and totems of basketball. Hoop Heaven is the second of their shared interpretations of the basketball court and its fixtures, painstakingly rendered in impossibly elevated techniques and environments.

The owner of the NFT can request a signed physical copy of the artwork purchased.
